name: Everstake
description: Everstake is one of the world’s biggest validators, servicing 735,000+ users across 70+ blockchains. As a node operator on Ethereum, we handle 1.9% of staked ETH, or 650,00+ ETH from 9,000+ stakers. Everstake has validated Ethereum since its PoS genesis, retaining a slashing-free operation. We boast ~99.9% uptime, battle-tested infrastructure, and a team of seasoned experts. In EigenLayer, Everstake’s mission is to support the most promising AVSs and provide the best delegation services for stakers.
